column5: LAST MINUTE CANCELLATION SPECIAL!!! $299/night!! THIS WEEKEND ONLY!! Friday, June 23- Monday, June 26, 2017. (checkout Monday)  *for up to 8 guests. Non-refundable cleaning fee and tax not included. Must book minimum 3 night stay to receive special rate.  Located in the entertainment district on South Padre Island, you will be just steps away from some of the Island's finest attractions. This charming home and venue is available for weddings, receptions, parties or the perfect romantic hideaway.
column8: Hacienda Style Home on South Padre
